presentation: We are going to go through a set of questions in order to find the right organisations for your needs. Your answers are totally anonymous. If you want to have more information about how we are using data on our website, please check our privacy policy page.

user.question: Who are you seeking help for?

dots_categories.question: What do you need help with?

dots_subCategories.question: Please select what you need help with?

filters.housingAndSocialServices: Access to housing and social services
filters.economicResources: Access to economic resources and information technology
filters.financialServices: Access to financial services and microfinance
filters.protectionClimatEvents: Initiatives to protect against climate-related events
filters.agriculturalLand: Access to agricultural land and other production resources
filters.smallScaleFarmers: Access to services for small-scale farmers to increase productivity and income
filters.resilientAgriculturalPractices: Implement resilient agricultural practices and increase productivity
filters.adaptFarmingPractices: Adapt farming practices to climate change and environmental disasters
filters.farmingResources: Access to seed and plant banks and other resources for farming
filters.ruralInfrastructureResources: Resources for rural infrastructure, agricultural research, and technology
filters.drugAbuse: Prevention and treatment of drug abuse
filters.accessToHealthcare: Access to healthcare services, medicines, and vaccines
filters.primaryAndSecondaryEducation: Access to primary and secondary education
filters.accessHigherEducation: Access to affordable technical, vocational and higher education
filters.skillsForEmployment: Develop relevant skills for employment and entrepreneurship
filters.sustainableDevelopementEducation: Education for sustainable development and lifestyle
filters.endWomenDiscrimination: Programs to end discrimination against women
filters.endViolenceWomen: Programs to end violence and exploitation against women
filters.legislationForGenderEquality: Adopt and strengthen policies and legislation for gender equality
filters.economicProductivity: Increase economic productivity through technological innovations
filters.youthEmployment: Access to youth employment, education and training
filters.endingDiscriminationLaws: Incentivise ending discrimination laws and policies
filters.migration: Ensure safe, orderly and regular migration back home
filters.developmentPlanning: Strengthen national and regional development planning
filters.justiceAndLegalAid: Access to justice and legal aid
filters.legalIdentity: Access to legal identity and registration
filters.humanRightsProtection: Access to information and protection of human rights
